word_mean: 动脉硬化：一组特征为动脉壁增厚和弹性丧失的疾病，它包含三种不同的形式：动脉粥样硬化、Monckeberg动脉硬化(动脉中层钙化)和小动脉硬化

sentence.Network_en: Arteriosclerosis affects an increasingly broad segment of the older population.
sentence.Network_cn: 老年人中动脉硬化越来越多.

sentence.Network_en: Exposure to CO may enhance the development of underlying arteriosclerosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 一氧化碳暴露可以加剧潜在动脉硬化症的发展.

sentence.Network_en: I had been warned that he was beginning to show sighs of arteriosclerosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 我已得知,他已开始有动脉硬化的征象.

脑动脉硬化(cerebral arteriosclerosis)是一种危害老年人健康的常见疾病，它不仅可引起头晕、头痛、耳鸣、失眠和记忆力减退等多种不适，而且可诱发.

entry.def: Arteriosclerosis is a medical condition in which the walls of your arteries become hard and thick, so your blood cannot flow through them properly.

auth_sentence.content: Causes of arteriosclerosis This damage to the arteries doesn't happen overnight.
